application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of Energy Performance Certificates [EPC's] and detailed modelling output reports , in pursuant to condition 9 part B of planning permission ref: 194202VAR dated 25.03.2020  for 'Application for Minor Material Amendment (S73) to vary conditions 2, 14, 22 and 23 of planning permission ref: 164632FUL dated 11.09.2017, as varied by 184977VAR (s73 amendment) dated 10.05.2019 for "Redevelopment of the site to provide a six storey building with one basement level fronting onto Uxbridge Road comprised of 1x retail unit on the ground floor (A1 Use Class)(525sqm), 36x residential units on the upper floors, and associated storage, cycle parking, and services at the basement level (Block A); and the construction of  7x three-storey terraced houses fronting onto Westminster Road (Block B) with associated landscaping and substation" (Variations seek to reduce the floor area of the basement, relocate Block A cycle storage to ground floor and alteration to refuse store )'
